DF_distri <- function(T_val = 100, seed = 12345, sd_rv = 1, y_0 = 1, n_monte = 10, T_vals_only = T) {
  set.seed(seed)
  t_vector <- c()
  list_t_greater_0 <- list()
  # k <- 1

  for (j in 1:n_monte) {
    y <- c()
    y[1] <- y_0
    y_fin <- c()

    for (i in 2:(T_val + 50)) {
      eps <- rnorm(1, mean = 0, sd = sd_rv)
      y[i] <- y[i - 1] + eps
    }
    y_fin <- y[(50 + 1):(T_val + 50)]
    data <- tibble()
    data <- tibble(
      t = 1:T_val,
      y = y_fin
    )
    model <- list()
    model <- lm(diff(y) ~ lag(y)[2:T_val] - 1, data = data)

    # if (coef(model)[2] > 0) {
    #   list_t_greater_0[[k]] <- list(
    #     y = data$y,
    #     model = summary(model),
    #     t_val = summary(model)$coefficients[2, 3]
    #   )
    #   k <- k + 1
    # }

    t_vector[j] <- summary(model)$coefficients[1, 3]
  }
  if (T_vals_only == F) {
    t_95 <- sort(t_vector, decreasing = T)[n_monte * 0.95]
    t_99 <- sort(t_vector, decreasing = T)[n_monte * 0.99]
  }

  if (T_vals_only == T) {
    list_return <- t_vector
  }
  if (T_vals_only == F) {
    list_return <- list(
      t_vector = t_vector,
      quantile_95 = t_95,
      quantile_99 = t_99,
      list_0 = list_t_greater_0
    )
  }
  return(list_return)
}

microbenchmark(DF_distri(T_val = 200, n_monte = 10000), times = 1)
df_distr_test <- DF_distri(T_val = 50, n_monte = 10000)

sort(df_distr_test, decreasing = T)[10000 * 0.99]

GSADF_fun <- function(x, min_window, step_length, window_increase) {
  nrow_x <- length(x)
  window_size <- min_window

  result <- tibble()
  k_ind <- 1
  while (window_size < (nrow_x - step_length)) {
    max_i <- floor((nrow_x - window_size) / step_length)
    for (i in 0:max_i) {
      adf_list <- suppressWarnings(adf.test(
        x = x[(step_length * i):((step_length * i) + window_size)],
        alternative = "stationary",
        k = 0
      ))
      result[k_ind, "t_value"] <- adf_list[["statistic"]][["Dickey-Fuller"]]
      result[k_ind, "start_day"] <- step_length * i
      result[k_ind, "end_day"] <- ((step_length * i) + window_size)
      result[k_ind, "interval_length"] <- window_size
      k_ind <- k_ind + 1
    }
    window_size <- window_size + window_increase
  }
  result
}

GSADF_fun_result <- GSADF_fun(x = danske, min_window = 30, step_length = 5, window_increase = 10)
GSADF_fun_result <- GSADF_fun(x = btc, min_window = 30, step_length = 5, window_increase = 10)
GSADF_fun_result <- GSADF_fun(x = tsla, min_window = 30, step_length = 5, window_increase = 10)


p_val_fun <- function(t_val, interval_length) {
  sum(t_val > df_distri_list[,paste("T_val_", interval_length, sep = "")])/nrow(df_distri_list)
}
